page.title: 03LIFE STYLES IN DIPTON.
page.content: A DAY IN MY MAM'S LIFE by{LUCY TURNER. {7.20a.m.}Gets out of bed. {7.40a.m.}Makes baits,(packed lunches). {8.00a.m.}Cooks bacon for breakfast. {8.40a.m.}Sends us off to school. {8.41a.m.}Watches Breakfast Television. {9.20a.m.}Starts to clean the house. {10.00a.m.}Catches the bus to Stanley. {10.15a.m.}Shops at the Open Market. {11.00a.m.}Swims in Stanley Baths. {12.15p.m.}Gets the bus to Grandma's. {12.30p.m.}Has dinner with Grandma. {3.30p.m. }Returns to our house. {3.35p.m.} Makes the Afternoon Tea. {4.14p.m. }Relaxes in the armchair. {6.00p.m.} Takes us to the Park. {9.30p.m.} Tucks us up in Bed. {9.35p.m.} Knits a jumper. {11.25p.m.}Switches off House Lights. {11.30p.m.}Retires to Bed {11.45p.m.}Sound asleep ----- {AT LAST.
